title: MCR Safety S220WR Polyester Mesh General Purpose Safety Vest with 1-3/8-Inch White Reflective Stripe, Fluorescent Lime
features: Front hook and loop adjustable closure measures 3/4-Inch by 2-Inch; elastic side straps measures 3/4-Inch by 8-Inch
Features 1-3/8-Inch white vinyl reflective strips (no diagonal pattern) sewn vertically onto vest front to back continuously
Available in fluorescent lime color; vest measures 47-Inch length by 18-Inch width
description: This general purpose safety vest is made of polyester mesh material. Front hook and loop adjustable closure measures 3/4-Inch by 2-Inch. Elastic side straps measures 3/4-Inch by 8-Inch, black cotton binding measures 3/4-Inch. Features 1-3/8-Inch white vinyl reflective strips (no diagonal pattern) sewn vertically onto vest front to back continuously. For crowd control, warehouse workers, construction (not around roadways), yard maintenance and shopping cart retrieval. Available in fluorescent lime color. Vest measures 47-Inch length by 18-Inch width.
